#include <iostream>
#include <string.h>
#define MAXN 1000
using namespace std;
char str[MAXN + 1];
int p[MAXN + 1];
int main(){
    int T,H;
    bool possible;
    scanf("%d", &T);
    while(T--){
               possible = true;
               scanf("%s", str);
               scanf("%d", &H);
               int len = strlen(str);
               p[0] = 1;
               for(int i = 0; i < len - 1; i++){
                       if(i == 0)
                            p[i + 1] = (str[i] - '0') - p[i];
                       else
                            p[i + 1] = (str[i] - '0') - p[i] - p[i - 1];
               }
               for(int i = 0; i < len; i++){
                       if(p[i] < 0 || p[i] > 1){
                               possible = false;
                               break;
                       }
               }
               if(!possible)
                            printf("NONE\n");
               else
                   printf("%d\n", p[H]);
    }
    return 0;
}
